arStrings.szText: The {c_highlight}Red-Cloaked Horror{/c} and its mischievous {c_highlight}Blightfiends{/c} are relentlessly terrorizing the Fractured Peaks.
Conquer Midwinter Blight monsters and activities to collect {c_highlight}Blighted Fragments{/c}, {c_highlight}Lost Heirlooms{/c}, and {c_highlight}Red-Cloaked Trophy{/c} event materials.
Exchange event materials for {c_highlight}Midwinter Proofs{/c} at the {c_highlight}Collections Table{/c} in Kyovashad to {c_highlight}upgrade the Midwinter Square{/c} and unlock a series of rewards.
Use {icon:hibernal_proofs, 2.5}{c_highlight}Midwinter Proofs{/c} to purchase {c_highlight}limited-time event rewards{/c} from {c_highlight}Gileon{/c}.
